titles.title: Manassas National Battlefield Park Amendments of 1994
To provide for the orderly termination of easements and property used for public utility purposes at the Manassas National Battlefield Park.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: 5/17/1994--Introduced. Manassas National Battlefield Park Amendments of 1994 - Authorizes the owner of any easement or property within the Addition to Manassas National Battlefield Park, Virginia, taken by the United States to be used for public utility purposes to initiate a proceeding in a court of competent jurisdiction seeking a determination of just compensation with respect to the taking of such property at any time within nine years after the enactment of the Manassas National Battlefield Park Amendments of 1988.
